prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, Drums, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of a Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This song has a Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, Drums, and Bass, but Piano is not included.
